text: Polikushka () is a 1922 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Alexander Sanin. It stars Ivan Moskvin, Vera Pashennaya, and Yevgeniya Rayevskaya. ==Actors== * Ivan Moskvin - Polikushka * Vera Pashennaya - Akulina, Polikushka's wife * Yevgeniya Rayevskaya - The Lady * Varvara Bulgakova - The Lady's niece * Sergey Aydarov - Steward == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1922 movies
title: Polikushka
